title: A modern take on piano, violin, cello
description: The three Ahn sisters (cellist Maria, pianist Lucia, violinist Angella) breathe new life into the piano trio with their passionate musicmaking. At TEDWomen, they start with the bright and poppy "Skylife," by David Balakrishnan, then play a gorgeous, slinky version of "Oblivion," by Astor Piazzolla.
author: Ahn Trio
keywords: TED, talks, entertainment, live music, performance, music
